description: Try our easy to follow Sesame Prawn Toasts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sesame Prawn Toasts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using a slotted spoon, transfer the toasts to paper towels and drain briefly. Serve hot, garnished with coriander.
